channel.title: FLF - The Rebel Podcast
channel.description: FIGHT LAUGH FEAST PRESENTS SHOWS PROCLAIMING THE LORDSHIP OF CHRIST OVER ALL OF LIFE.
channel.itunes:author: FLF, LLC

item.title: Biblical Cosmology Episode 3: Crazy Questions and Unhinged Answers [The Rebel Podcast]
item.description:
What is this universe that we live in? Its full of rocks and dust, hummingbirds and anteaters, black holes and microbials. But is it just stuff? What about the things we cannot see? The things that go bump in the night?

The bible is full of information about the unseen realm of this universe and it also has a lot to say about the conflict taking place in this war torn cosmos.

This is the third episode in our series, so make sure that if you missed the previous two episodes you go back to listen to the groundwork that has been laid.

In this third episode we take some time to answer listeners questions that have come in since we started the series... it's great to know many of you are still following us on this crazy study!

If you have questions while we work our way through, please send them to us through any social media messaging or by emailing rebelpodcastflf@gmail.com

If you would like to support the network you can become a Fight Laugh Feast Club member, if you want to support our show specifically you can become a patron here:https://www.patreon.com/reformedrebel
item.author: Pastors Nate & Chris & Jordan, The Rebels
item.itunes:author: Pastors Nate & Chris & Jordan, The Rebels

item.title: True Magic with Bnonn Tennant [The Rebel Podcast]
item.description:
When God put Adam in the Garden he gave him a pattern to follow in order to shape the world as he and his bride took dominion. In the Lords Prayer Jesus taught us to pray that Gods Kingdom would come on earth as it is in heaven. Heavenly, spiritual realities give meaning and purpose to this symbolic world.

This week P Nate is joined by Dominic Bnonn Tennant to talk about his newest project - True Magic. You can follow the project at truemagic.substack.com You can also find more from Bnonn at https://discipleshipanddominion.substack.com/ and bnonn.com
item.author: Pastor Nate & Dominic Bnonn Tennant
item.itunes:author: Pastor Nate & Dominic Bnonn Tennant
